titleStmt.title: A notable and memorable story of the cruel war between the Carthaginians and their own mercenaries. Gathered out of Polybius, and other authors, by that famous historian, Sir Walter Ralegh.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho: Vnderhill at the signe of the Bible in Woodstreet.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
